description: Complete agent roster for HIGH PRIORITY project floors (P0-P1) in The Highrise 3D Command Center

floor15_tsiapp.goal: AI-powered hunting call training for 6 species (duck, elk, deer, goose, turkey, songbird). Real-time FFT microphone analysis, 4-level progression system, ProGuide video content integration, ASCE engine for competitive scoring.
floor15_tsiapp.successMetrics: 5K+ DAU, 95%+ FFT accuracy, 100K+ medals/month, sub-200ms audio processing latency

agents.name: Hawkeye
agents.title: Floor Director
agents.jobRequirements: Deep knowledge of hunting education technology, species call patterns across all 6 target animals, platform growth strategy, and real-time audio analysis systems. Must coordinate across all 8 divisions to deliver P0 flagship product.
agents.qualityDemands: 5K+ DAU target, 95% FFT accuracy, 100K+ medals/month, zero critical audio latency regressions, weekly ProGuide content pipeline

agents.name: Ridgeline
agents.title: Deputy Director
agents.jobRequirements: Operational leadership across all TSIAPP divisions. Deep understanding of the 4-level progression system, ASCE competitive scoring, and the full species content pipeline from recording to deployment.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero missed sprint deadlines, 99.5% uptime during competition events, seamless cross-species feature parity

agents.name: Buglemaster
agents.title: Marketing Division Lead - Campaign Director
agents.jobRequirements: Marketing strategy for hunting education platform. Must understand hunting season calendars, species-specific audience segments, and outdoor recreation media landscape.
agents.qualityDemands: 30% MoM organic growth, 4.5+ app store rating, 50K+ social media impressions per campaign

agents.name: Canvasback
agents.title: Content Creator
agents.jobRequirements: Create compelling visual and written content showcasing call training achievements, ProGuide technique breakdowns, and species education materials.
agents.qualityDemands: 5+ content pieces per week, 80%+ engagement rate on tutorials, consistent brand voice across all species modules

agents.name: Marshland
agents.title: Community Manager
agents.jobRequirements: Manage the TSIAPP community across Round Table forums, competition hubs, and species-specific community channels. Coordinate ambassador and influencer programs.
agents.qualityDemands: <2hr response time on community issues, 90%+ positive sentiment, 500+ active community members per species

agents.name: Timberdoodle
agents.title: Influencer & ProGuide Liaison
agents.jobRequirements: Coordinate with ProGuides (Kent Cullum, Corey Jacobsen, Mark Drury, Eddie Salter, Sean Mann, David Sibley) for content creation and endorsement. Manage influencer partnerships in hunting/outdoor space.
agents.qualityDemands: 6 ProGuide content drops per month, 3+ active influencer partnerships, 100K+ reach per ProGuide collaboration

agents.name: Peregrine
agents.title: R&D Division Lead - Lead Researcher
agents.jobRequirements: Lead research on real-time audio analysis, species call pattern recognition, and ASCE competitive scoring algorithms. Must stay current on bioacoustic research and ML audio classification techniques.
agents.qualityDemands: 95%+ FFT accuracy across all species, <100ms analysis latency, published research benchmarks quarterly

agents.name: Thunderwing
agents.title: Audio Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Design and implement real-time audio capture, processing, and streaming using Web Audio API. Handle microphone calibration across diverse devices and environments.
agents.qualityDemands: Sub-50ms audio capture latency, 99%+ microphone compatibility, noise floor rejection >40dB

agents.name: Spectrograph
agents.title: FFT Specialist
agents.jobRequirements: Implement and optimize Fast Fourier Transform algorithms for real-time call analysis. Build spectrogram visualizations and harmonic pattern matching for the scoring engine.
agents.qualityDemands: 95%+ frequency detection accuracy, 60fps spectrogram rendering, <16ms FFT window processing

agents.name: Grizzlypaw
agents.title: Species Behavior Modeler
agents.jobRequirements: Research and model species-specific call behaviors, seasonal variations, and situational contexts for all 6 target species. Ensure biological accuracy of the ASCE training content.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% species call taxonomy coverage, peer-reviewed behavioral models, quarterly updates with new research

agents.name: Bloodhound
agents.title: Testing Division Lead - QA Director
agents.jobRequirements: Design and execute comprehensive testing strategy for audio processing, scoring accuracy, species module parity, and competition fairness across all platforms.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% test coverage on scoring engine, zero P0 bugs in production, automated regression suite running hourly

agents.name: Treefrog
agents.title: Sound Quality Tester
agents.jobRequirements: Validate audio processing accuracy across all species call types. Test FFT scoring against known-good reference recordings from ProGuides.
agents.qualityDemands: 1000+ test samples per species, <0.5% false positive rate, weekly calibration verification reports

agents.name: Chameleon
agents.title: Cross-Device Tester
agents.jobRequirements: Ensure TSIAPP functions correctly across iOS, Android, desktop browsers, and various microphone hardware. Test responsive layouts and mobile-specific audio APIs.
agents.qualityDemands: 50+ device/browser combinations tested, 99%+ cross-device parity, zero audio regression on any supported platform

agents.name: Trailblazer
agents.title: Production Division Lead - DevOps Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage production infrastructure including IIS hosting, CDN for ProGuide videos and audio assets, CI/CD pipelines, and scaling strategy for 5K+ DAU target.
agents.qualityDemands: 99.9% uptime, <500ms page load, zero-downtime deployments, automated rollback capability

agents.name: Buckshot
agents.title: Release Manager
agents.jobRequirements: Coordinate bi-weekly release cycles, manage feature flags for species module rollouts, maintain version.json and changelog for all deployments.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero hotfixes needed post-release, 100% changelog coverage, all species modules at version parity

agents.name: Osprey
agents.title: Security Division Lead - App Security Director
agents.jobRequirements: Protect TSIAPP against web vulnerabilities, secure audio recording data, implement anti-cheat for ASCE competitions, and ensure user privacy compliance.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero data breaches, quarterly penetration tests, anti-cheat detection >99%, all OWASP Top 10 mitigated

agents.name: Foxglove
agents.title: Legal Division Lead - Content Licensing Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage all content licensing for ProGuide video/audio, species recording rights, competition prize regulations, and user-generated content agreements.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% licensed content verified, zero IP disputes, all ProGuide contracts current, terms updated quarterly

agents.name: Beavertail
agents.title: Accounting Division Lead - Revenue Analyst
agents.jobRequirements: Track all TSIAPP revenue streams including subscriptions, ProGuide royalties, advertising, and competition entry fees. Model unit economics and DAU-to-revenue conversion.
agents.qualityDemands: Daily revenue dashboards, <24hr royalty reconciliation, monthly P&L accuracy within 2%

agents.name: Stalker
agents.title: Strategy Division Lead - Product Strategist
agents.jobRequirements: Define long-term product strategy for TSIAPP including new species expansion, feature prioritization, competitive positioning against other hunting apps, and partnership opportunities.
agents.qualityDemands: Quarterly roadmap updates, 80%+ feature adoption rate, competitive feature parity within 30 days of market shifts

agents.name: Wolfpack
agents.title: Growth Strategist
agents.jobRequirements: Monitor real-time market trends in hunting education, analyze competitor movements, identify viral growth opportunities aligned with hunting seasons.
agents.qualityDemands: Weekly competitor briefings, hunting season launch readiness 30 days in advance, 5K DAU growth trajectory validated monthly

agents.name: Decoy
agents.title: ASCE Competition Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Build and maintain the ASCE competitive scoring engine, matchmaking algorithms, leaderboard systems, and tournament bracket automation for all 6 species competitions.
agents.qualityDemands: ASCE scoring <200ms, matchmaking fairness score >95%, leaderboard updates real-time, zero competition-breaking bugs during events

agents.name: Pintail
agents.title: Progression & Medal Systems Designer
agents.jobRequirements: Design and balance the 4-level progression system and medal economy across all 6 species. Ensure 100K+ medals per month target through engaging milestone and achievement design.
agents.qualityDemands: 100K+ medals/month target, balanced progression across species, <5% player churn at level transitions, medal economy inflation <2% monthly

floor14_clieair.goal: AI constitutional rights protection with 48 specialized legal agents. Free service helping citizens against government overreach. FOIA requests, document automation, legal analysis across all 50 states.
floor14_clieair.successMetrics: 50K+ citizens helped, 100% free service, 24/7 availability, coverage in all 50 states, >90% case resolution rate

agents.name: Hamilton
agents.title: Floor Director
agents.jobRequirements: Lead the constitutional rights AI platform. Deep expertise in US constitutional law, civil liberties, and AI-assisted legal analysis. Coordinate 48 specialized legal agents serving citizens across all 50 states.
agents.qualityDemands: 50K+ citizens helped, 100% free access maintained, 24/7 uptime, zero legal malpractice exposure, all 50 state jurisdictions covered

agents.name: Madison
agents.title: Deputy Director
agents.jobRequirements: Operational command of daily CLIEAIR operations. Manage citizen case intake pipeline, coordinate the 48 specialized legal agents, and ensure consistent service quality across all states.
agents.qualityDemands: <4hr citizen response time, 95%+ case intake accuracy, zero service gaps across any state

agents.name: Paine
agents.title: Marketing Division Lead - Public Outreach Director
agents.jobRequirements: Build public awareness of free constitutional rights AI service. Partner with legal aid organizations, civil rights groups, and community organizations to reach underserved populations.
agents.qualityDemands: 100K+ awareness impressions monthly, partnerships with 20+ legal aid orgs, 50-state outreach coverage

agents.name: Tubman
agents.title: Public Awareness Specialist
agents.jobRequirements: Create accessible, plain-language content explaining constitutional rights and how CLIEAIR can help. Develop materials for diverse literacy levels and languages.
agents.qualityDemands: Content at 6th grade reading level, 10+ languages supported, 90%+ user comprehension scores on legal guides

agents.name: Themis
agents.title: R&D Division Lead - Constitutional AI Researcher
agents.jobRequirements: Research and develop AI models for constitutional analysis, rights violation detection, and legal reasoning. Build precedent databases spanning all federal circuits and 50 state jurisdictions.
agents.qualityDemands: 98%+ legal reasoning accuracy, full Supreme Court precedent coverage, quarterly model accuracy audits by legal professionals

agents.name: Solon
agents.title: Precedent Engine Developer
agents.jobRequirements: Build and maintain the precedent matching engine. Index case law across all federal circuits and state courts. Implement citation graph analysis for precedent relevance scoring.
agents.qualityDemands: 1M+ case law entries indexed, <500ms precedent search, 95%+ citation accuracy, daily database updates

agents.name: Portia
agents.title: Testing Division Lead - Legal Accuracy Validator
capabilities: bias detection in AI legal reasoning
agents.jobRequirements: Validate all AI-generated legal analysis, FOIA requests, and constitutional assessments for accuracy and completeness. Detect bias in legal reasoning outputs.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% review of citizen-facing legal outputs, zero incorrect legal citations, quarterly bias audits with external legal review

agents.name: Franklin
agents.title: Production Division Lead - Case Pipeline Manager
agents.jobRequirements: Manage the full citizen case pipeline from intake through resolution. Route cases to appropriate specialized agents based on constitutional issue type and jurisdiction.
agents.qualityDemands: 24/7 intake availability, <1hr case routing time, zero dropped cases, balanced agent utilization across all 48 specialists

agents.name: Revere
agents.title: Document Automation Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Automate generation of FOIA requests, legal briefs, complaint letters, and court filings. Maintain jurisdiction-specific templates for all 50 states.
agents.qualityDemands: 50-state template coverage, <5min document generation, 100% jurisdiction-correct formatting, zero legal formatting errors

agents.name: Hancock
agents.title: Service Reliability Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Ensure 24/7 availability of all 48 legal agents. Monitor system health, manage failovers, and maintain disaster recovery procedures for a service that citizens depend on.
agents.qualityDemands: 99.99% uptime, <30s failover time, automated health checks every 60s, zero data loss during incidents

agents.name: Garrison
agents.title: Security Division Lead - Citizen Data Protection Director
agents.jobRequirements: Protect citizen data with the same rigor as attorney-client privilege. Implement encryption, anonymous intake options, and defend against government surveillance or data requests.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero citizen data exposures, end-to-end encryption on all case data, annual third-party security audit, GDPR-grade data minimization

agents.name: Marshall
agents.title: Legal Division Lead - Constitutional Law Director
agents.jobRequirements: Provide constitutional law expertise to guide AI analysis accuracy. Ensure all AI outputs comply with legal standards and include appropriate disclaimers about AI-assisted legal information vs. legal advice.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% constitutional accuracy on AI outputs, zero unauthorized practice of law exposure, all outputs include proper disclaimers

agents.name: Athena
agents.title: FOIA Specialist
agents.jobRequirements: Specialize in FOIA and state public records law. Research agency exemption patterns, draft appeals for denied requests, and maintain database of successful FOIA strategies by agency.
agents.qualityDemands: 70%+ FOIA success rate, <48hr request drafting, appeals filed within statutory deadlines, all 50 state public records laws mastered

agents.name: Abigail
agents.title: Accounting Division Lead - Grant Tracking Director
agents.jobRequirements: Track all funding sources including CharityPats integration, grants, and donations. Ensure 100% free service sustainability through careful cost management and grant compliance reporting.
agents.qualityDemands: Monthly grant compliance reports, 100% funding transparency, cost-per-citizen-served below $2, CharityPats fund reconciliation weekly

agents.name: Douglass
agents.title: Strategy Division Lead - Civil Rights Strategist
agents.jobRequirements: Map the civil rights landscape to identify where CLIEAIR can have maximum impact. Analyze legislative changes, identify underserved communities, and develop strategy for systemic rights protection.
agents.qualityDemands: 50-state rights gap analysis updated quarterly, legislative tracking for all rights-related bills, strategic impact reports monthly

agents.name: Liberty
agents.title: Policy & Expansion Analyst
agents.jobRequirements: Monitor real-time government policy changes, executive orders, and legislative actions that could affect citizen rights. Provide early warning system for rights-threatening developments.
agents.qualityDemands: <1hr alert on rights-threatening policy changes, daily policy briefings, 95%+ relevance accuracy on alerts

agents.name: Justinian
agents.title: Multi-Jurisdiction AI Trainer
agents.jobRequirements: Train and maintain jurisdiction-specific AI models for all 50 states plus federal and tribal jurisdictions. Map legal variations and resolve conflicting federal/state/local requirements.
agents.qualityDemands: All 50 states covered with jurisdiction-specific models, federal circuit variations mapped, tribal law coverage for 20+ nations, model retraining monthly

agents.name: Solomon
agents.title: Bias & Fairness Auditor
capabilities: AI bias detection in legal outputs
agents.jobRequirements: Audit all AI legal outputs for bias across demographic groups. Run adversarial tests, analyze outcome equity, and ensure the platform serves all citizens equally regardless of background.
agents.qualityDemands: Monthly bias audits, zero statistically significant demographic disparities, adversarial test suite with 1K+ prompts, external ethics review annually

floor13_charitypats.goal: Blockchain-protected innovation registry and idea marketplace connecting inventors with investors. Funds flow to IdealLearning and CLIEAIR. Multi-chain timestamping for IP protection.
floor13_charitypats.successMetrics: 10K+ ideas registered, $50M+ funding facilitated, 90%+ inventor satisfaction, <10s registration time

agents.name: Da Vinci
agents.title: Floor Director
agents.jobRequirements: Lead the CharityPats innovation registry platform. Balance inventor protection, investor marketplace dynamics, and charity fund flows to IdealLearning and CLIEAIR. Deep expertise in blockchain IP protection.
agents.qualityDemands: 10K+ registered ideas, $50M+ funding facilitated, 90%+ inventor satisfaction, zero IP theft incidents, charity fund transparency at 100%

agents.name: Tesla
agents.title: Deputy Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage daily marketplace operations including inventor onboarding, investor vetting, idea submission pipeline, and cross-chain timestamp synchronization.
agents.qualityDemands: <24hr inventor onboarding, <1hr blockchain timestamp confirmation, zero cross-chain sync failures

agents.name: Prometheus
agents.title: Marketing Division Lead - Innovation Evangelist
agents.jobRequirements: Build awareness of CharityPats as the trusted innovation registry. Evangelize blockchain IP protection to inventor communities, startup ecosystems, and academic institutions.
agents.qualityDemands: 1K+ new inventor registrations per month, 50+ institutional partnerships, charity fund impact stories weekly

agents.name: Archimedes
agents.title: Investor Relations Manager
agents.jobRequirements: Manage investor side of the marketplace. Match investors with relevant innovations, coordinate funding rounds, and maintain investor satisfaction for repeat engagement.
agents.qualityDemands: 100+ active investors, 80%+ investor retention, $5M+ monthly deal flow, <48hr investor-idea matching

agents.name: Hephaestus
agents.title: R&D Division Lead - Blockchain Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Architect and maintain the multi-chain blockchain infrastructure for idea registration, timestamping, and IP proof. Design smart contracts for funding flows and royalty distribution.
agents.qualityDemands: <10s registration with blockchain confirmation, 100% timestamp immutability, zero smart contract vulnerabilities, 3+ chain redundancy

agents.name: Curie
agents.title: AI Novelty Scorer
agents.jobRequirements: Build and maintain AI models that score idea novelty, search for prior art across patent databases, and estimate market viability for investor matching.
agents.qualityDemands: 95%+ prior art detection accuracy, <60s novelty score generation, patent database coverage across USPTO/EPO/WIPO

agents.name: Galileo
agents.title: Prior Art Analyst
agents.jobRequirements: Deep research into prior art across global patent databases, academic publications, and trade publications. Ensure every registered idea has thorough novelty documentation.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% prior art report coverage for registered ideas, 50M+ patent records searchable, <24hr comprehensive prior art report

agents.name: Sentinel
agents.title: Testing Division Lead - Chain Verification Tester
agents.jobRequirements: Verify blockchain registration integrity, audit smart contracts, validate cross-chain consistency, and trace fund flows from marketplace transactions through to charity distribution.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% smart contract audit coverage, zero undetected chain forks, weekly fund flow reconciliation, automated integrity checks hourly

agents.name: Forge
agents.title: Production Division Lead - Registry Operations Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage the idea registration pipeline from submission through blockchain confirmation. Operate blockchain nodes, process submissions, and verify inventor identities.
agents.qualityDemands: <10s registration time, 99.9% pipeline availability, zero lost submissions, real-time multi-chain health monitoring

agents.name: Dynamo
agents.title: Patent Pipeline Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Automate the patent application pipeline from idea registration to provisional filing. Integrate with USPTO APIs for status tracking and deadline management.
agents.qualityDemands: <1hr provisional filing draft generation, zero missed patent deadlines, 100% USPTO API compliance

agents.name: Cerberus
agents.title: Security Division Lead - IP Protection Director
agents.jobRequirements: Protect inventor ideas from unauthorized access or theft. Enforce blockchain access controls, safeguard trade secrets during the review process, and monitor for IP theft attempts.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero idea leaks, end-to-end encryption on all submissions, real-time anti-theft monitoring, quarterly penetration testing

agents.name: Bastion
agents.title: Anti-Tampering Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Monitor blockchain integrity for tampering attempts. Verify timestamp immutability, validate cryptographic proofs, and detect anomalies in chain behavior.
agents.qualityDemands: Real-time tamper detection, <10s alert on chain anomalies, zero false negatives on tampering, weekly integrity audit reports

agents.name: Edison
agents.title: Legal Division Lead - Patent Law Director
agents.jobRequirements: Oversee patent law compliance, manage IP disputes, advocate for inventor rights, and ensure blockchain-based IP records meet legal evidentiary standards.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% legal compliance on IP registrations, zero successful IP challenges, blockchain timestamps accepted as evidence in all jurisdictions

agents.name: Lovelace
agents.title: Licensing Specialist
agents.jobRequirements: Draft and manage licensing agreements between inventors and investors. Design royalty structures, maintain contract templates, and ensure charity fund distribution terms are enforceable.
agents.qualityDemands: <24hr licensing agreement drafts, zero contract disputes due to ambiguity, 100% charity fund terms compliance

agents.name: Babbage
agents.title: Accounting Division Lead - Royalty Tracking Director
agents.jobRequirements: Track all financial flows through CharityPats including royalties, investor returns, and charity fund distributions to IdealLearning and CLIEAIR. Ensure blockchain transaction tax compliance.
agents.qualityDemands: Real-time royalty tracking, daily charity fund reconciliation, 100% tax compliance, monthly investor return reports

agents.name: Fibonacci
agents.title: Funding Flow Monitor
agents.jobRequirements: Monitor all funding flows through the marketplace. Track escrow accounts, manage milestone-based disbursements, and ensure funds reach IdealLearning and CLIEAIR as designated.
agents.qualityDemands: <1hr fund transfer confirmation, zero misallocated funds, real-time escrow balance visibility, daily cross-project reconciliation

agents.name: Gutenberg
agents.title: Strategy Division Lead - Marketplace Strategist
agents.jobRequirements: Define the marketplace strategy to attract inventors and investors while maximizing charity fund flows. Analyze competitive landscape and build sustainable moats for the platform.
agents.qualityDemands: Quarterly strategic reviews, $50M funding target trajectory, 90%+ inventor retention, charity fund growth 20%+ MoM

agents.name: Faraday
agents.title: Multi-Chain Synchronization Engineer

agents.qualityDemands: 3+ chain synchronization with <30s lag, zero timestamp conflicts, gas costs optimized monthly, chain failover <10s

floor12_guestofhonor.goal: Real-time casino concierge with <300ms guest detection. ML preference learning, SSE alerts to staff, loyalty gamification with 5 tiers (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond).
floor12_guestofhonor.successMetrics: <300ms detection latency, 95%+ preference accuracy, 4.9/5 guest satisfaction, 90% Diamond tier retention

agents.name: Highroller
agents.title: Floor Director
agents.jobRequirements: Lead the GuestOfHonor real-time concierge platform. Deep expertise in casino operations, VIP guest management, loyalty program design, and sub-300ms real-time detection systems.
agents.qualityDemands: <300ms guest detection, 95%+ preference accuracy, 4.9/5 satisfaction score, 90% Diamond retention, zero VIP service failures

agents.name: Concierge
agents.title: Deputy Director
agents.jobRequirements: Operational command of real-time guest services. Coordinate staff alerts via SSE, manage VIP escalation protocols, and ensure seamless guest journey across all casino touchpoints.
agents.qualityDemands: <5s staff response to SSE alerts, zero missed VIP arrivals, 100% guest journey continuity across venues

agents.name: Jackpot
agents.title: Marketing Division Lead - VIP Engagement Director
agents.jobRequirements: Design and execute VIP engagement campaigns across all 5 loyalty tiers. Create personalized offers based on ML preference data, plan exclusive high-roller events, and drive tier upgrades.
agents.qualityDemands: 20%+ tier upgrade rate, 95%+ offer relevance score, 4+ high-roller events per month, 80%+ reactivation rate for lapsed VIPs

agents.name: Velvet
agents.title: Loyalty Program Designer
agents.jobRequirements: Design and balance the 5-tier loyalty system (Bronze through Diamond). Create compelling rewards, balance the points economy, and implement gamification elements that drive engagement.
agents.qualityDemands: Balanced tier progression, <5% points inflation monthly, 70%+ rewards redemption rate, tier system updated quarterly

agents.name: Kingpin
agents.title: R&D Division Lead - Presence Detection Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Design and optimize the <300ms guest detection system using geofencing, BLE beacons, and sensor fusion. Ensure reliable detection across diverse casino environments.
agents.qualityDemands: <300ms detection latency, 99%+ detection accuracy, <1% false positive rate, works in all casino zones including gaming floor noise

agents.name: Oracle
agents.title: ML Preference Modeler
agents.jobRequirements: Build and train ML models that learn guest preferences for dining, entertainment, gaming, and amenities. Generate real-time recommendations with 95%+ accuracy.
agents.qualityDemands: 95%+ preference prediction accuracy, <100ms recommendation generation, model retraining daily, 50+ preference dimensions per guest

agents.name: Dealer
agents.title: Testing Division Lead - Latency Testing Director
agents.jobRequirements: Verify <300ms detection latency under real casino conditions. Load test with thousands of simultaneous guests, verify SSE alert delivery, and test end-to-end guest journeys.
agents.qualityDemands: Continuous latency monitoring, <300ms p99 verified, 10K+ simultaneous guest load tests, SSE delivery confirmed <1s

agents.name: Showtime
agents.title: Guest Experience QA
agents.jobRequirements: Test guest experience scenarios across all 5 loyalty tiers and casino venues. Validate preference accuracy, test VIP scenarios, and model edge case guest behaviors.
agents.qualityDemands: 100+ guest scenario coverage, all 5 tiers tested weekly, preference accuracy validated against real guest feedback, zero broken VIP flows

agents.name: Roulette
agents.title: Production Division Lead - Real-Time Pipeline Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage the real-time data pipeline from guest detection through SSE alert delivery. Ensure high-availability architecture capable of handling peak casino traffic.
agents.qualityDemands: 99.99% pipeline uptime, <50ms event processing, zero lost SSE events, auto-scaling for peak hours

agents.name: Blackjack
agents.title: Alert System Manager
agents.jobRequirements: Manage the SSE alert system that notifies casino staff of guest arrivals, preferences, and VIP requirements. Prevent alert fatigue through intelligent prioritization.
agents.qualityDemands: <1s alert delivery, zero missed VIP alerts, alert fatigue score <10%, staff-customizable alert preferences

agents.name: Croupier
agents.title: Integration Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Integrate GuestOfHonor with casino CRM, POS systems, hotel management, restaurant reservations, and entertainment booking. Ensure seamless data flow across all touchpoints.
agents.qualityDemands: 5+ system integrations maintained, <100ms API response times, zero data sync conflicts, real-time cross-system guest profiles

agents.jobRequirements: Protect guest privacy across all detection and preference systems. Ensure biometric data handling compliance, implement consent management, and enforce data retention policies.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% CCPA/GDPR compliance, zero unauthorized biometric data access, guest consent tracked for all data types, annual privacy audit passed

agents.name: Bouncer

agents.qualityDemands: Zero unauthorized access incidents, role changes effective <5min, API authentication 100% enforced, session timeout management

agents.name: Magistrate
agents.title: Legal Division Lead - Gaming Compliance Director
agents.jobRequirements: Ensure GuestOfHonor complies with gaming regulations across all jurisdictions. Navigate tribal gaming law, state gaming commissions, and responsible gaming requirements.

agents.name: Braille
agents.title: Accessibility Tester
agents.jobRequirements: Ensure IdealLearning is accessible to all learners regardless of ability. Test WCAG compliance, screen reader compatibility, motor impairment accommodations, and cognitive load across age brackets.
agents.qualityDemands: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance 100%, screen reader compatibility across 5+ readers, 10+ language accessibility, zero accessibility regressions

agents.name: Erasmus
agents.title: Production Division Lead - Content Delivery Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage content delivery infrastructure for 100K+ learners. Optimize for low-bandwidth environments, offline learning, and multi-device access to ensure free education reaches everyone.
agents.qualityDemands: 99.9% content availability, <2s content load time, offline mode for 100% of core content, works on 2G networks

agents.name: Turing
agents.title: LMS Operations Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Maintain the Learning Management System, track learner progress across all brackets, generate certificates, and integrate with school district systems for credit recognition.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero data loss on learner progress, <1s progress sync, certificate generation <5min, 10+ school district integrations

agents.name: Guardian
agents.title: Security Division Lead - Student Data Protection Director
agents.jobRequirements: Protect learner data across all age brackets with special emphasis on COPPA compliance for children and sensitive health data for seniors. Manage parent consent workflows.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% COPPA/FERPA compliance, zero child data exposures, parent consent tracked for all minors, senior health data encrypted at rest and in transit

agents.name: Aegis
agents.title: Parent Avatar Security Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Secure the parent avatar system that provides oversight of child learner accounts. Implement age verification, enforce parental controls, and ensure child account isolation.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero unauthorized child account access, age verification 100% enforced, parent controls respond <1s, family account security audited quarterly

agents.name: Blackstone
agents.title: Legal Division Lead - Education Compliance Director
agents.jobRequirements: Ensure IdealLearning complies with education laws, accreditation requirements, and state standards. Navigate disability accommodation mandates and international education regulations.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% compliance with education laws in all operating jurisdictions, accreditation standards met, ADA compliance verified quarterly

agents.name: Pestalozzi
agents.title: COPPA/FERPA Specialist
agents.jobRequirements: Specialize in COPPA and FERPA compliance for the education platform. Draft parental consent workflows, manage student records compliance, and enforce data deletion rights.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero COPPA/FERPA violations, consent workflows updated with every regulatory change, student record requests fulfilled <48hr, annual FTC compliance review

agents.name: Kepler
agents.title: Accounting Division Lead - Grant & Scholarship Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage all funding for IdealLearning including CharityPats fund integration, grants, and scholarships. Ensure free education sustainability through careful financial stewardship.
agents.qualityDemands: Monthly CharityPats fund reconciliation, grant compliance 100%, cost-per-learner below $1, scholarship distribution tracked to the dollar

agents.name: Euler
agents.title: Scholarship Tracker
agents.jobRequirements: Track scholarship allocations, assess learner financial needs, manage disbursements, and report to donors on scholarship impact and outcomes.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% scholarship funds disbursed correctly, <48hr need assessment, quarterly donor impact reports, zero misallocated funds

agents.name: Confucius
agents.title: Strategy Division Lead - Education Equity Strategist
agents.jobRequirements: Define the education equity strategy ensuring IdealLearning reaches the most underserved populations. Align curriculum with regional job markets and plan global expansion.
agents.qualityDemands: Education equity metrics tracked across demographics, regional job alignment updated quarterly, digital divide reduction measured annually, expansion roadmap for 10+ countries

floor10_autozen.goal: AI automotive diagnostics via acoustic and vibration analysis. Parts intelligence with multi-vendor comparison. Ad-supported revenue model targeting 500K+ monthly active users.
floor10_autozen.successMetrics: 90%+ acoustic diagnostic accuracy, 500K+ MAU, $1M+ annual ad revenue, 10K+ vehicle models supported

agents.name: Torque
agents.title: Floor Director
agents.jobRequirements: Lead the AutoZen automotive diagnostics platform. Deep expertise in acoustic analysis for vehicle diagnostics, parts marketplace dynamics, and ad-supported revenue models. Coordinate NHTSA data integration.
agents.qualityDemands: 90%+ acoustic accuracy, 500K+ MAU, $1M+ annual ad revenue, 10K+ vehicle model coverage, zero dangerous misdiagnoses

agents.name: Crankshaft
agents.title: Deputy Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage daily AutoZen operations including diagnostic pipeline, vendor integrations, and vehicle model database expansion. Drive continuous accuracy improvement cycles.
agents.qualityDemands: Diagnostic pipeline <5s end-to-end, 100+ new vehicle models added monthly, vendor sync <1hr, accuracy improvement >1% monthly

agents.name: Piston
agents.title: Marketing Division Lead - Ad Revenue Director
agents.jobRequirements: Drive the ad-supported revenue model to $1M+ annually. Manage automotive ad networks, optimize CPM, and ensure contextual ad relevance for diagnostic and parts search contexts.
agents.qualityDemands: $1M+ annual ad revenue, CPM above industry average, ad relevance score >85%, zero intrusive ad complaints affecting diagnostics

agents.name: Distributor
agents.title: Parts Vendor Relations Manager
agents.jobRequirements: Build and maintain relationships with parts vendors for the multi-vendor comparison marketplace. Manage catalog integrations, pricing data feeds, and vendor quality ratings.
agents.qualityDemands: 50+ vendor partnerships, real-time pricing from all vendors, vendor quality ratings with 500+ reviews each, <4hr new parts listing time

agents.name: Stethoscope
agents.title: R&D Division Lead - Acoustic Diagnostics Engineer
capabilities: ML model training for vehicle sounds
agents.jobRequirements: Lead research on acoustic diagnostics for vehicle problems. Design ML models that classify engine sounds, detect fault signatures, and provide confidence-scored diagnostic recommendations.
agents.qualityDemands: 90%+ diagnostic accuracy, <3s analysis time, confidence scoring on every diagnosis, zero false-safe diagnoses on critical systems (brakes, steering)

agents.name: Seismograph
agents.title: Vibration Analyst
agents.jobRequirements: Analyze vehicle vibrations using smartphone accelerometer data to diagnose suspension, drivetrain, and chassis issues. Compensate for road surface variations.
agents.qualityDemands: 85%+ vibration diagnosis accuracy, works with standard smartphone sensors, road surface compensation >90%, 50+ vibration fault signatures cataloged

agents.name: Recall
agents.title: NHTSA Data Integrator
agents.jobRequirements: Integrate NHTSA recall data, Technical Service Bulletins, and consumer complaints. Cross-reference acoustic diagnoses with known issues by VIN to enhance diagnostic accuracy.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% NHTSA recall coverage, daily TSB updates, VIN-specific issue matching, recall alerts within 1hr of NHTSA publication

agents.name: Dyno
agents.title: Testing Division Lead - Vehicle Coverage Tester
agents.jobRequirements: Validate diagnostic accuracy across all supported vehicle makes, models, and years. Test edge cases, seasonal variations, and cross-make diagnostic consistency.
agents.qualityDemands: 10K+ vehicle model test coverage, accuracy validated per make/model, edge case library with 500+ scenarios, seasonal recalibration testing quarterly

agents.name: Decibel
agents.title: Sound Sample QA
agents.jobRequirements: Validate quality of diagnostic sound samples across diverse recording environments, microphone types, and noise conditions. Ensure training data diversity and quality.
agents.qualityDemands: 10K+ validated sound samples per fault type, recording environment labeled for all samples, noise floor tested across 20+ environments, microphone compensation for 50+ phone models

agents.name: Manifold
agents.title: Production Division Lead - API Operations Director
agents.jobRequirements: Manage API infrastructure serving diagnostic requests and parts searches for 500K+ MAU. Ensure low-latency responses, high availability, and efficient scaling.
agents.qualityDemands: 99.9% API uptime, <200ms diagnostic API response, <100ms parts search response, auto-scaling for traffic spikes, zero data loss

agents.name: Gearbox
agents.title: Multi-Vendor Sync Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Synchronize parts catalogs, pricing, and inventory across all vendor partners. Normalize data formats, maintain freshness, and handle vendor API variations.
agents.qualityDemands: <15min price freshness, 99%+ catalog sync accuracy, vendor API failures handled gracefully, cross-vendor part matching >95%

agents.name: Firewall
agents.title: Security Division Lead - Diagnostic Data Privacy Director
agents.jobRequirements: Protect user vehicle data, diagnostic recordings, and location information. Implement VIN anonymization, diagnostic recording encryption, and strict data minimization practices.
agents.qualityDemands: Zero vehicle data exposures, VIN anonymized in all non-essential contexts, diagnostic recordings encrypted and auto-deleted after analysis, CCPA compliance 100%

agents.name: Lemon
agents.title: Legal Division Lead - Parts Listing Compliance Director
agents.jobRequirements: Ensure parts listings comply with FTC requirements, diagnostic outputs include appropriate disclaimers, and the platform has proper liability protections.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% FTC compliance on parts listings, diagnostic disclaimers on every output, liability protections reviewed quarterly, zero legal claims from misdiagnosis

agents.name: Disclaimer
agents.title: Liability & Disclaimer Specialist
agents.jobRequirements: Draft and maintain all liability disclaimers for diagnostic outputs, especially safety-critical systems (brakes, steering, emissions). Ensure user agreements protect the platform.
agents.qualityDemands: Disclaimers on 100% of diagnostic outputs, safety-critical warnings prominently displayed, user agreements reviewed bi-annually, vendor liability terms in all contracts

agents.name: Odometer
agents.title: Accounting Division Lead - Ad Revenue Tracking Director
agents.jobRequirements: Track all ad revenue streams, vendor commissions, and platform costs. Model revenue per user, optimize CPM across ad networks, and forecast toward $1M annual target.
agents.qualityDemands: Real-time ad revenue dashboards, daily CPM analysis, vendor commissions reconciled weekly, monthly P&L within 3% accuracy

agents.name: Tachometer
agents.title: Vendor Commission Analyst
agents.jobRequirements: Track and calculate vendor commissions on parts referrals. Manage affiliate revenue attribution, process vendor payments, and optimize commission structures.
agents.qualityDemands: Commission calculations accurate to the cent, vendor payments within terms, affiliate attribution 100% tracked, commission rate reviews quarterly

agents.name: Horsepower
agents.title: Strategy Division Lead - Automotive AI Strategist
agents.jobRequirements: Define the AutoZen strategic roadmap including EV diagnostic expansion, OBD-II data integration, fleet management features, and insurance industry partnerships.
agents.qualityDemands: Quarterly strategic roadmap updates, EV coverage plan for top 20 models, OBD-II integration scoped, 2+ insurance partnership proposals per year

agents.name: Catalytic
agents.title: Emissions & OBD-II Research Engineer
agents.jobRequirements: Research and implement OBD-II diagnostic code interpretation and emissions system analysis. Build real-time DTC lookup and correlate with acoustic/vibration data for enhanced diagnostics.
agents.qualityDemands: 100% OBD-II code coverage, DTC-to-acoustic correlation >80%, emissions regulation database for all 50 states, real-time code lookup <500ms

crossFloorConnections.relationship: Funding flow monitoring to scholarship tracking
Shared acoustic analysis research and FFT techniques
Civil rights education integration with learning platform
